The weather in Smallenske

  • Country and world

  • Coronaurus

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

4 minutes ago
The target is to provoke explosions in houses. The Office of the Attorney-General addressed the moles to prevent
The General Prosecutor ' s Office of the Russian Federation has recommended that the Russians seriously talk to children who may be used by Ukrainian terrorists.
41 minutes ago
Gholics hung on a loan swallow

The woman knew about this fraudulent scheme, but still got caught. The police started criminal proceedings for theft.

Today, 16:11
The last day was warmed up. Friday's glossing with wet snow and rain
Tomorrow in Smallsk, thermometer temometers will remain in the pit zone, but soon the anticylon will be in our spotlight. He's going to get a cold on the Smolench, and he's gonna give you an opportunity to see the winter sun again.
Today, 15:35
Eleven Africans were detained at the border of the Smolene region

This has been reported in the Russian Federation ' s Regional Programme. One of the migrants found a fake visa.

Today, 14:58
A hospital opened in the smurflight centre after repair

This was reported by the Regional Ministry of Health in Social Networks. After the reconstruction, the Roslav CRB opened.

Today, 14:38
Get the Smolena NPP to focus
Future school graduates in our region have the opportunity to receive higher education under the Rosengergoat Targeted Training Programme. That's what we should do now.

Today, 14:22
The governor of the Smolenchs congratulated the students on the holiday.

Vasili Anohin's torment post has been published in social media. He called unsatisfactory and commitment to the main qualities of the resin student.

Today, 13:47
Smolone received compensation for dog bite.

The incident occurred at the end of last year. The court came to the victim ' s side and ordered him to pay 15,000 roubles of compensation for moral harm.

Today, 13:08
In Smolenska, a briber was brought before the court in a high-profile corruption case at a medical facility.

The investigation gathered a sufficient evidence base. The criminal case with the approved indictment was sent to the court for examination on the merits.

Today, 12:33
The cause of the fire that burned pigs was considered an infrared lamp

Remember, the incident occurred in the Holm Jirkov district. Fire took more than 20 domestic animals.

Today, 11:57
An enlarged meeting of the regional public headquarters for electoral monitoring took place in Smallsk.

An enlarged meeting of the regional public headquarters for election observation was held in Smallsk. The Commissioner for Human Rights in the Smole region, Alexander Kaputin, and the Vice-President of the Ozbircoma participated in his work.

Today, 11:21
The house exploded in the smolen radius because of the ignition. Petomete killed

The incident was reported in the regional MSP of Russia. I couldn't get the beloved dog out of the fire.

Today, 10:45
The governor of the Smole region gave the girl from the DPP a doll house.
Vasili Anohin made a 7-year-old dream. Eves from the Mangush Peg, who became a member of the federal charitable project, the Young of Wish.
Today, 08:58
Alexander Novikov congratulated the Moles on two holidays.

He published a post with warm words in social media. Today is the day of Russian students and Tatiyanin.

Today, 07:36
The Rosgvard Engineering Service observed a professional holiday
24 January is the 77th anniversary of the formation of the engineering service of the national guard of the Russian Federation.
yesterday, 22:45
The Moles have 12 more days to apply for the Project Manager.
This year, the final of the Russian competition will be held for the first time in Smallsk from 13 to 15 June. The Observatory is Governor Vasili Anohin.

yesterday, 22:04
The Smolen Military Academy is awarded by the Kotuzova Order
The representative of the State Duma, Sergey Neverov, reported that the educational institution had received a high award.
yesterday, 21:39
Vasili Anohin will meet with the people of the Kardimov region
All interested Governor of the Smole region is invited to the district Cultural House on January 26th.
yesterday, 21:16
The Silvana perinatal centre will hold Open Day
The event will take place on the next Saturday, 27 January. In the programme, lectures, future moms, children ' s examinations, individual consultations.
Yesterday, 20:29
Vasili Anohin: " The Roslavl awaits a large-scale launch of heat supply networks "
Road repairs will take place in virtually all rural settlements in the Roslav region. The Governor summarized the meeting with the inhabitants of the municipality, which was attended by 500 people.
